headline: Lululemon Launches Its First Sneaker. The Market Shrugs.
content: The retailer known for its upscale leggings and athletic apparel has long been working to expand its business.

headline: U.S. Stocks Rebound From Rout; Treasuries Fall: Markets Wrap
content: (Bloomberg) -- U.S. stocks rebounded from the biggest rout since 2020, though markets remained gripped by volatility caused by the war in eastern Europe and the related sanctions. headline: Is Merck Stock A Buy On Expectations For Bullish Covid Pill Sales?
content: Is Merck stock a buy after the company guided to $5 billion to $6 billion in sales of its Covid pill this year? Is MRK stock a buy?

headline: IBD Screen of the Day: These Stocks Stand Out With Rising Profit Estimates
content: While companies with poor financials can shine during bull markets, in times of distress fundamentals are crucial.

headline: IBD 50 Stocks To Watch: Retail Giant Costco Eyes New Buy Point As RS Line Hits New High
content: Among the top stocks to watch, retail giant Costco is approaching a new buy point in the ongoing stock market correction.

headline: Trying to Predict a Market Bottom Is a Poor Trading Strategy
content: The Biden speech in which he announced the end of U.S. buying of Russian oil and gas was a good 'buy the bad news' excuse.  There was also a story on Bloomberg that Ukraine is dropping its request to join NATO.  There was some selling of oil into the spike after Biden spoke, and breadth is running slightly positive, but headline risk remains high.

headline: European Gas Lurches With Market Focused on Russia Supply
content: (Bloomberg) -- European natural gas prices swung wildly on Tuesday amid a flurry of events that call into question the future of Russian supplies as governments seek to isolate Moscow for its invasion of Ukraine. content: (Bloomberg) -- Tesla Inc.
